28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Mas'ud said:"The Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) narrated about the Night of Isra', saying that he did not pass an assembly of angels except that they ordered him: 'Order cupping among your Ummah

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Cupping
